snippet: Jimmie Johnson’s Nascar championship leaves him one behind the record seven won by Richard Petty and Dale Earnhardt.
abstract: Auto Racing Roundup; Jimmie Johnson wins his sixth Nascar championship in eight years, staking his claim as one of the most dominant competitors in sports history; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson’s Nascar championship leaves him one behind the record seven won by Richard Petty and Dale Earnhardt.

headline.main: Johnson Gets the Finish He Needs for a Sixth Title
headline.print_headline: Johnson Gets the Finish He Needs for a Sixth Title
